title.rendered: Choice Hotels International to Report 2024 Second Quarter Results on August 8, 2024

content.rendered:
NORTH BETHESDA, Md., July 10, 2024 /PRNewswire/ — Choice Hotels International, Inc. (NYSE: CHH), one of the world’s largest lodging franchisors, will report its second quarter 2024 earnings results at approximately 6:30 a.m. EDT on Thursday, August 8, 2024. The company will also hold a conference call at 10 a.m. EDT, during which Patrick Pacious, president and chief executive officer, and Scott Oaksmith, chief financial officer, Choice Hotels, will discuss the company’s performance.


Continue Reading

To participate in the teleconference, please dial (800) 549-8228 (domestic) or (646) 564-9445 (international) and use the conference ID 34768. A live webcast will also be available under the Events and Presentations tab of the company’s investor relations website, www.investor.choicehotels.com.

The call will be recorded and available for replay on the investor relations website within 24 hours. In addition, the call will be archived on the investor relations website and can be accessed via the Events and Presentations tab.

About Choice Hotels®
Choice Hotels International, Inc. (NYSE: CHH) is one of the largest lodging franchisors in the world, with nearly 7,500 hotels, representing more than 630,000 rooms, in 45 countries and territories as of March 31, 2024. A diverse portfolio of 22 brands that range from full-service upper upscale properties to midscale, extended stay, and economy enables Choice® to meet travelers’ needs in more places and for more occasions while driving more value for franchise owners and shareholders. The award-winning Choice Privileges® rewards program and co-brand credit card options provide members with a fast and easy way to earn reward nights and personalized perks. For more information, visit www.choicehotels.com.

SOURCE Choice Hotels International, Inc.

Originally published at https://www.prnewswire.com/news-releases/choice-hotels-international-to-report-2024-second-quarter-results-on-august-8-2024-302192323.html
Images courtesy of https://pixabay.com
